text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1982. ==Events== *21 February - Stella is selected to represent Belgium at the 1982 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Si tu aimes ma musique". She is selected to be the twenty-seventh Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the RTBF Studios in Brussels. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1980s=== *Tik Tak (1981-1991) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *8 January - Ronny Daelman, actor *9 February - Guillaume Devos, actor *30 October - Lien Van de Kelder, actress ==Deaths==
title: 1982 in Belgian television
